pr_title: Release azure spring data cosmos 3.0.0 beta.2

timeline.message: Updated readme with nested partition key feature samples, changelog and pom.xml for azure-cosmos version
Updated readme and changelog with dates and release version

timeline.bodyText: @weshaggard Could you confirm if this is the correct versioning strategy if the package has updated its group and artifact id.
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText:
@samvaity @weshaggard - group id is same -> com.azure, this is just an artifact id upgrade -
from azure-spring-data-2-3-cosmos to azure-spring-data-cosmos
We have already released track 2 version of this library once here :
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.azure/azure-spring-data-2-3-cosmos/3.0.0-beta.1
replies.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: We could reset the version but I think just incrementing it here is probably ok assuming we still plan to release this as a 3.0.0 GA.
replies.author: weshaggard

replies.bodyText: @weshaggard - yes that is the plan - this is supposed to go GA as 3.0.0
replies.author: kushagraThapar
